select * from mh_order_history where to_char(order_date,'yyyy-mm') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm')

select oh.order_date, oh.order_qnt, m.menu_price from mh_order_history oh, mh_menu m where oh.menu_id=m.menu_id and to_char(order_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and oh.store_id=#{store_id} order by oh.order_date asc

select m.menu_name,m.menu_category,sum(menu_price) as menu_price,count(h.menu_id) as menu_num from mh_menu m, mh_order_history h where h.menu_id=m.menu_id and store_id=#{store_id} and to_char(order_date,'yyyy-mm')=#{search_month} group by h.menu_id,m.menu_name,m.menu_category

select m.menu_name,count(h.menu_id) as menu_num,NVL2(h.menu_id,sum(menu_price),0) as menu_price from mh_menu m left outer join mh_order_history h on h.menu_id=m.menu_id and store_id=#{store_id} and to_char(order_date,'yyyy-mm')=#{search_month} where menu_category=To_number(#{menu_category}) group by h.menu_id,m.menu_name
